title: 104_s2135
content: Coal Industry Retiree Health Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce annual premiums to the United Mine Workers of America Combined Benefit Fund for eligible small assigned operators. Waives specified installment nonpayment penalties. Provides a one-time suspension of contributions for certain assigned operators. Revises the per beneficiary premium calculation. Provides for the disclosure of beneficiary employment history to a requesting assigned operator. Sets forth treatment of withdrawal liability provisions for certain 1988 agreement operators.
